modName: Suki save game from Avatar-The Last Airbender series
summary:
This is a save game of Kyoshi Warrior, Suki from Avatar: The Last Airbender series.
I tried to make Suki in Skyrim and this is the best I could do.
I equipped Suki with Blades armor and weapons, because they look like the best option.
She is a master (skill 100) of One Handed, Block and Heavy Armor.
I made her with cheats, 0% of
descriptionHtml:
This is a save game of Kyoshi Warrior, Suki from Avatar: The Last Airbender series.
I tried to make Suki in Skyrim and this is the best I could do.
I equipped Suki with Blades armor and weapons, because they look like the best option.
She is a master (skill 100) of One Handed, Block and Heavy Armor.
I made her with cheats, 0% of the game is done, the experience is all yours.
She is level 33.

Anyone else misses the Avatar? :)

Installation:
Extract "Suki.rar", copy "Suki.ess" from the "Saves" folder, and paste it into  C:\Users\Your name\Documents\My Games\Skyrim\Saves

Uninstall (why would you even think about that, duh) : Remove "Suki.ess" from C:\Users\Your name\Documents\My Games\Skyrim\Saves

Pictures of Suki ingame are posted here on this page, but you can also find them in the "Suki.rar"

That's all guys :)
author: Kowya
